entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:12 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -42.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 11:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -42.2°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -46.7°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 42. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Ice fog at times. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning then sunny. Ice fog at times in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 40. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
